content.rendered:
Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Ecosystem

The definition of DeFi is a concept of a financial ecosystem living digitally on a shared infrastructure. In this world, typical financial services such as borrowing, lending and trading exist, but they operate on a public network, meaning it’s accessible to anyone with an internet connection. Open-source protocols or modular frameworks are relied upon for creating and issuing assets on this network, much like email exists today. Below we listed a few companies in different categories that comprise the DeFi ecosystem.

If you would like to be included in the list, please let us know.

Assets Tokenization
Compliance & Identity
Marketplaces & Liquidity
Infrastructure
Lending
Payments
Prediction Markets
Stablecoins
Wallets & Asset Management

Assets Tokenization

In a DeFi world, asset tokenization platforms enable companies to dematerialize assets on a decentralized blockchain and digitally subscribe eligible investors. They enforce the compliance, onboard the investor and provide an interface for investors and issuers to manage their assets. Ultimately, through the digitisation of securities, they improve the accessibility to more and new types of investors.

OUR SOLUTION HIGHLIGHT

T-REX Platform

Learn More
Tokeny Solutions
Tokeny Solutions allows financial actors operating in private markets to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using blockchain technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.
AlphaPoint
AlphaPoint is the white label platform for exchanges, brokerages and tokenization of assets.
Codefi
Codefi is the blockchain application suite powering commerce and finance, built to optimize business processes and digitize financial instruments.
iSTOX
iSTOX is a future-ready capital markets platform set to usher in a new era for capital fundraising and investment.
Globacap
Globacap offers the equity management software that can support the life cycle of securities.
Polymath
Polymath makes it easy to create, issue, and manage digital securities on the blockchain.
Tokensoft
Tokensoft's software platform automates the fundraising and investor management experience on the blockchain.
Vertalo
The platform that is connecting and enabling the digital asset and DeFi ecosystem
Securitize
Securitize enables digital securities, which are easier to own, simpler to manage, and faster to trade.

Compliance & Identity

Compliance and identity solutions are needed to implement rules and regulations on the blockchain. Standard ERC-20 tokens do not provide this functionality. Compliance and identity protocols are therefore imperative to enable the legal transfer of tokenized private market securities.

OUR SOLUTION HIGHLIGHT

T-REX Protocol

Learn More
Tokeny Solutions
Tokeny Solutions allows financial actors operating in private markets to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using blockchain technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.
3Box
3Box is a next-generation framework for managing user data on the internet.
Blockpass
Blockpass is a blockchain based self-sovereign identity protocol for the connected world. Blockpass offers shared regulatory compliance services for humans, companies, objects and devices.
Bloom
Bloom is a blockchain solution for secure identity and credit scoring.
Civic
Civic secures blockchain identity toolbox and ecosystem.
Colendi
Colendi is blockchain based credibility evaluation and global identity for the sharing economy.
Chainalysis
Chainalysis provides blockchain data and analysis to government agencies, exchanges, and financial institutions across 40 countries.
Hydro
Hydro enables new and existing private systems to seamlessly integrate and leverage the immutable and transparent dynamics of a public blockchain.
Elliptic
Elliptic manages financial crime risk, achieve regulatory compliance, and grow with confidence.
Identity
Identity is an open source ecosystem providing access to on-demand, secure identity verification.
Jolocom
Jolocom is an open source protocol for people and organizations to create and interact with digital, self-sovereign identities.
SelfKey
SelfKey is building a blockchain-based identity system that allows identity owners to truly own, control and manage their digital identity.
Sovrin
Sovrin is an open source project creating a global public utility for self-sovereign identity.
Scorechain
Scorechain provides AML & Compliance solutions for cryptocurrencies.
uPort
uPort is an open identity system for the decentralized web.

Marketplaces & Liquidity

These actors provide buy-side users for the ecosystem. In this interoperable world, they connect to the ecosystem to provide new opportunities and improve the levels of liquidity for their audiences. 

OUR SOLUTION HIGHLIGHT

T-REX Platform   

Learn More
Tokeny Solutions
Tokeny Solutions allows financial actors operating in private markets to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using blockchain technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.
1inch.exchange
1inch.exchange split the order to several decentralized exchanges like UniswapExchange, KyberNetwork, Bancor and RadarRelay to avoid high price slippage.
area2invest
area2invest offers a marketplace for securities and token issuances. The platform links natural and legal persons, non-professional and professional investors with issuers from different asset and product classes.
Atomex
Atomex allows users to securely and anonymously exchange Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, and Tezos via its own desktop wallet and also provides low-level APIs for integration.
Black Manta Capital Partners
Black Manta Capital Partners is a BaFin regulated and MiFID II compliant one-stop-agency for all technical, financial, and legal aspects of Tokenization.
Binance
Beyond operating the world's leading cryptocurrency exchange, Binance spans an entire ecosystem.
Balancer
Balancer Exchange allow you to swap ERC20 tokens trustlessly across all Balancer’s liquidity pools.
Bamboo Relay
Bamboo Relay is a 0x and bZx relayer – trade, lend or borrow any ERC20 token from your own wallet.
Bancor
Bancor is an on-chain liquidity protocol that enables automated, decentralized token exchange on Ethereum and across blockchains.
Bounties Network
The Bounties Network empowers humans to incentivize and self-organize, from freelancing to grassroots social action, and anything in between.
Codefi Market
Enhance liquidity for digital securities with a white label solution that enables fast and secure peer-to-peer asset transfers.
Curve
Curve is an exchange liquidity pool on Ethereum designed for extremely efficient stablecoin trading.
DDEX
DDEX is the decentralized exchange built on Hydro Protocol technology, offering real-time order matching with secure on-chain settlement.
DeversiFi
DeversiFi is a hybrid Ethereum exchange platform providing access to spot trading, margin trading, P2P funding & decentralized trading.
DEX.AG
DEX.AG enables you to pick token to buy and compare rates on multiple decentralized exchanges.
dex.blue
dex.blue is a platform with advanced trading technology, enabling trustless real-time trading of tokenized assets on the Ethereum blockchain.
Dodo
DODO is a on-chain liquidity provider which leverages the Proactive Market Maker algorithm (PMM) to provide on-chain and contract-fillable liquidity for everyone.
Dolomite
Dolomite is a decentralized exchange for ERC-20 tokens trading with built-in portfolio management and cryptocurrency market analysis tools.
district0x
A network of decentralized markets and communities. Create, operate, and govern. Powered by Ethereum, Aragon, and IPFS.
dYdX
dYdX is a trading platform for crypto assets, built with open-source protocols, enabling decentralized margin trading.
Gitcoin
Gitcoin is a platform for you to get paid for working on open source software in Python, Rust, Ruby, JavaScript, Solidity, HTML, CSS, Design, and more.
IDEX
IDEX is a non-custodial exchange that integrates with any custody solution and allows users to trade with one another without giving up control to a third-party custodian.
JellySwap
JellySwap is a cross-chain exchange powered by decentralized atomic swap technology.
KyberSwap
KyberSwap allows anyone to convert tokens directly from their wallet in an instant, convenient and secure way.
Liquality
Liquality is an interface that offers the secure way to swap cryptocurrencies between BTC, DAI, and ETH with minimal risk and fees, while maintaining control over your private keys.
Loopring Exchange
Loopring Exchange is an orderbook-based exchange on Ethereum leveraging Zero-Knowledge Proofs.
LocalCryptos
LocalCryptos is a peer-to-peer Ethereum and Bitcoin marketplace with 100000+ users in 130 countries. Sign up today to trade crypto with any payment method.
Matcha
Matcha is a crypto trading platform with smart order routing powered by 0x. Matcha aggregates liquidity from multiple sources, including 0x, Kyber, Uniswap, Oasis, Curve, and others.
Mesa
Mesa is an open source interface for Gnosis Protocol, a fully permissionless DEX that enables ring trades to maximize liquidity.
Mooniswap
Mooniswap is a next generation of the AMM exchanges with virtual balances, enabling liquidity providers to capture profits otherwise captured by arbitrageurs.
Oasis
Oasis is a decentralized, non-custodial exchange built on the OasisDEX Protocol enabling the trade of the tokens used in Multi-Collateral Dai (MCD).
OpenBazaar
OpenBazaar is a different way to do online commerce. It’s a peer to peer application that doesn’t require middlemen, which means no fees & no restrictions.
OpenSea
The world’s largest digital marketplace for crypto collectibles and non-fungible tokens (NFTs), including ERC721 and ERC1155 assets.
Origin
Origin enables decentralized commerce and finance
ParaSwap
ParaSwap is a decentralized exchange aggregator that provides the best prices over multiple DEXs on the Ethereum blockchain.
Radar
Building products for next financial system.
Rarible
The first community-owned NFT marketplace. Create, sell or collect digital items secured with blockchain.
SushiSwap
The SushiSwap exchange allows users to swap any ERC20 token into any other ERC20 token through automated liquidity pools.
Swerve Finance
Swerve is a community fork of curve.fi designed for efficient stablecoin trading, with platform/developer fees removed.
Switcheo
Switcheo is a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange that allows cross-chain swapping and trading of EOS, Ethereum and NEO tokens.
Tokenlon
Tokenlon is a decentralized exchange based on 0x Protocol, with a design preventing front-running and trade collisions.
Totle Swap
With Totle Swap, users automatically can get the best price on the DEX market for any ERC-20 token in a near instant swap.
Uniswap Exchange
Uniswap Exchange is an automated fully decentralized token exchange on Ethereum.

Infrastructure

These players provide seamless integrations with blockchains to allow web 3.0 developers to easily build on top of. They include oracles that provide secure external reference data to smart contracts and cross-blockchain networks that connect specialized blockchains and enable interoperability.

OUR SOLUTION HIGHLIGHT

T-REX Protocol

Learn More
Tokeny Solutions
Tokeny Solutions allows financial actors operating in private markets to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using blockchain technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.
0x Protocol
0x Protocol is a free, open-source infrastructure that developers and businesses utilize to build products that enable the purchasing and trading of crypto tokens.
0xcert
0xcert is an open-source framework to create, manage and swap digital assets (ERC-721) and value tokens (ERC-20) on the blockchain.
Alchemy
Alchemy is an infrastructure provider for web3 developers interacting with Ethereum blockchain.
Blocknative
Blocknative’s infrastructure and APIs provide real-time mempool monitoring to keep your transactions flowing reliably, resiliently, and predictably.
Carbon
Carbon is an all-in-one fiat-to-crypto on-ramp API to help you retain new customers effortlessly, so you can focus on building.
Centrifuge
Open, decentralized platform to connect the global financial supply chain.
Chainlink
Chainlink is a decentralized oracle that can provide external data to smart contracts.
dfuse
dfuse provides a Web 3.0 Data Stack with robust and reliable APIs to build next-generation applications on the blockchain.
Fabrx
Fabrx is a Web3 automation and middleware platform for seamless integration of blockchain.
Fortmatic
Fortmatic SDK let users to interact with dApp through any browser or device.
Hummingbot
Hummingbot is an open source software client that helps you build and run high-frequency trading bots that run on any crypto exchange.
Hydro
Hydro is an open source framework for building Decentralized Exchanges.
Kyber Network
On-chain liquidity protocol allows decentralized token swaps to be integrated into any application.
Loopring
A protocol for decentralized token exchange, where traders have complete and total control of their crypto-assets.
Libonomy
Libonomy offers the industry's fastest blockchain to provide developers and business owners with a scalable, efficient and interoperable environment.
Melon
Melon is an Ethereum-based protocol for decentralized on-chain asset management, with frontend and backend hosted and executed on decentralized platforms.
Polygon
Polygon is a protocol and a framework for building and connecting Ethereum-compatible blockchain networks
Polkadot
Polkadot makes it easier than ever to create and connect decentralized applications, services, and institutions.
PayTrie
PayTrie is a stablecoin on/off-ramp, currently live in Canada
Provable
Provable is a blockchain oracle service, enabling data-rich smart contracts.
QuikNode
QuikNode is a RPC node service provider with APIs & dedicated nodes available.
Ramp
The protocol powering fiat to crypto exchanges
Ren
Ren is an open protocol that provides access to inter-blockchain liquidity for all decentralized applications.
Set Protocol
Set Protocol provides a solution for building businesses utilizing tokenized baskets including decentralized brokerages, robo-advisors, and issuance order bulletin boards.
Solana
Web-scale blockchain for fast, secure, scalable, decentralized apps and marketplaces.
The Graph
The Graph is a decentralized protocol for indexing and querying data from blockchains.
Torus
Torus allows users to login to your dApp with their OAuth accounts, Google and Facebook, to derive their private keys in a trustless manner.
Totle
Totle platform aggregating the top decentralized exchanges, and provides reliable infrastructure for decentralized liquidity.
Transak
Transak is a simple and compliant way for customers to buy and sell crypto assets with a bank transfer.
UMA
UMA is a decentralized financial contracts platform built to enable Universal Market Access.
Uniswap
Uniswap is an open source protocol for automated token exchange on Ethereum.
WalletConnect
WalletConnect is an open protocol for connecting desktop Dapps to mobile Wallets using end-to-end encryption by scanning a QR code.
Zap
Zap platform allows users to create, publish and subscribe to smart contract and Decentralized Application compatible data feeds.

Lending

Lending applications remove intermediaries involved in this traditional banking function. They provide the ability to secure loans and allow individuals and companies to collateralize their assets and earn interest.

Aave
Aave is an Open Source and Non-Custodial protocol to earn interest on deposits & borrow assets.
BlockFi
BlockFi provides the wealth management products crypto investors need, all powered by blockchain technology.
bZx
bZx protocol is a financial primitive for shorting, leverage, borrowing, and lending that empowers decentralized blockchain applications.
Compound
Compound is an open-source, autonomous protocol built for developers, enable algorithmic, efficient money markets on the Ethereum.
C.R.E.A.M. Finance
C.R.E.A.M. is a crypto lending and borrowing dApp based on the Compound protocol with altered pools assets and own governance token.
Celsius
Celsius addresses the financial needs of today’s consumers worldwide through an earning and lending platform accessible via a mobile app.
CoinLoan
CoinLoan is the first P2P lending platform for cryptoassets backed loans.
Dharma
Dharma provides portal to DeFi, trade 2,000+ assets on Uniswap anytime, anywhere.
Fulcrum
Fulcrum is the platform for tokenized margin trading and lending, enables users to lend assets for interest or enter into short/leveraged positions.
Lendingblock
Bringing securities lending to the digital asset economy through a professional trading exchange designed for institutional needs.
Linen App
Linen App lowers barriers to entry to the emerging Decentralized Finance (DeFi) markets for everyone.
Nexo
The leading regulated financial institution for digital assets, pioneer of the 1st Instant Crypto Credit Lines™ and high-yield Earn on Crypto & Fiat services.
Nuo
Nuo provides the non-custodial way to lend, borrow or margin trade crypto assets.
Oasis Borrow
Oasis Borrow allows you to lock your tokens as collateral to generate Dai, a decentralized stablecoin soft-pegged to 1 USD.
SALT
Securely hold & borrow against your cryptoassets with a crypto-backed loan.
Torque
Torque is a powerful DeFi platform for borrowing assets with indefinite-term loans and fixed interest rates.

Payments

Payment providers allow for the secure, scalable and instant transactions for individuals and institutions on a decentralized network.

Celer Network
Celer Network is a layer-2 scaling platform that enables fast and secure off-chain transactions for not only payment transactions, but also generalized off-chain smart contract.
Connext
Connext enables users to batch many Ethereum transactions into one netted transfer by using signed off-blockchain commitments rather than direct on-blockchain transactions.
Groundhog
Groundhog is a suite of tools to power recurring payments on Ethereum.
MoonPay
MoonPay makes the journey of buying cryptocurrencies simpler, faster and safer for everyone.
Request
Request is a decentralized network built on top of Ethereum, which allows anyone, anywhere to request, validate and execute payments.
Sablier
Sablier is the protocol for real-time finance on Ethereum, that enables continuous, autonomous and trustless payroll.
StablePay
StablePay enables ERC20 tokens payments converted to DAI and cDAI.
Whisp
Whisp is a payroll solutions build for crypto-economy. Pay your workers in crypto and automate the record-keeping.
Wyre
Wyre is a secure and compliant bridge between fiat currencies and cryptocurrency.
xDai Chain
xDai Chain provide users with fast transactions and low gas prices. xDai Stable Chain is Ethereum compatible, so data and assets can be transferred to the Ethereum providing backend safety and opportunities to scale.
zkSync
zkSync is a trustless protocol for scalable low-cost payments on Ethereum, powered by zkRollup technology.

Prediction Markets

Prediction markets are exchange-traded markets created to trade the outcome of events. The market prices can indicate what the crowd thinks the probability of the event is. Decentralized prediction markets can be created on any type of bet. Users can currently place no limit bets on sports, economics, world events and many other markets. 

Augur
Augur is a fully-decentralized open-source prediction market platform, intended to revolutionize the manner in which information consensus is collected and aggregated.
Gnosis
Gnosis is an open platform for creating prediction market applications on the Ethereum protocol.
Omen
Omen uses the Gnosis conditional token framework to give anyone the ability to create a prediction market - be it in the realm of crypto, sports, politics, entertainment, etc.
Polymarket
Polymarket is an information markets platform, where you can bet on the highly-debated topics and earn for being right.

Stablecoins

Stablecoins are backed by reserve assets that can be bought and sold through algorithmic mechanisms. They can be backed by FIAT currencies or commodities such as gold but they live on a blockchain and thus reap the benefits of privacy and efficiency of blockchain-based transactions. They were created to mitigate the volatility of cryptocurrencies.

OUR SOLUTION HIGHLIGHT

T-REX Protocol

Learn More
Ampleforth
AMPL is a USD soft-pegged digital currency, that adjusts supply daily based on market conditions.
Augmint
Augmint offers digital tokens targeted to a fiat currency. Stablecoin backed 1:1 by Euros.
Binance USD
BUSD is a 1:1 USD-backed stablecoin, issued by Binance in partnership with Paxos.
DAI
DAI is a crypto-backed stablecoin soft-pegged to USD, built on the Ethereum and governed by the MakerDAO system.
DefiDollar
DefiDollar is a stable asset, backed by an index of stablecoins. DUSD is a hedge against volatility and provides portfolio risk diversification.
Digix
Physical gold with DGX tokens, where 1 DGX represents 1 gram of gold on Ethereum.
Gemini Dollar
A stable value coin backed 1:1 by USD.
HUSD
HUSD is a stablecoin backed 1:1 by U.S. dollars held in a U.S. trust company.
Paxos Standard
PAX is a stablecoin backed 1:1 by USD, and listed on over 90 exchanges.
pTokens
pTokens are the ERC-20 token version of other, non-Ethereum blockchain currencies that enable liquidity to freely move from one blockchain to another.
TrueUSD
A stablecoin backed 1:1 by U.S. dollars.
USD Coin
USDC is a USD-backed stablecoin as an ERC20 token.
Wrapped Bitcoin
Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) is the ERC20 token backed 1:1 with Bitcoin.

Wallet & Asset Management

Wallets and asset management applications allow individuals and businesses to safely secure their assets. ERC-20 compatible wallets are required, as it means they can be connected to the wider DeFi ecosystem through a variety of asset management tools.

OUR SOLUTION HIGHLIGHT

T-REX Platform

Learn More
Tokeny Solutions
Tokeny Solutions allows financial actors operating in private markets to compliantly issue, transfer and manage securities using blockchain technology, enabling them to improve asset liquidity.
AlphaWallet
AlphaWallet is a mobile crypto wallet that interacts with smart contracts and dApps.
Argent
Argent is a smart contract based wallet for Ethereum crypto-assets and dApps.
Betoken
Betoken is an open source, crowd-powered, crypto asset management protocol connecting capital and talent.
Bitpie
Bitpie is a multi-blockchain mobile wallet. Bitpie enables users to transact and use DApps while holding assets totally under their control.
Cobo Wallet
Cobo Wallet is a multi-chain cryptocurrency wallet on iOS & Android, with built in dApps browser.
Coinbase Wallet
Coinbase Wallet is a mobile crypto wallet supporting multicoin assets as well as ERC-20 tokens and ERC-721 collectibles.
Curv
The Institutional Standard for Digital Asset Security
CoinPlus
Coinplus is about to set a new standard in the crypto/token space. This standard allows anyone to have an account, a crypto account.
DeFi Saver
DeFi Saver is a management dashboard for decentralized finance protocols, including MakerDAO CDPs (with features such as automatic liquidation protection), as well as Compound, dYdX and Fulcrum.
Eidoo
Eidoo gives access to a full range of features and financial services fully compliant, which are safe and easy to use via the Eidoo app, including a non-custodial Wallet, a Hybrid Exchange and a platform to participate and launch token sales.
Enjin
Enjin is a mobile cryptocurrency wallet with dApp browser, supporting Ethereum, Bitcoin, Litecoin, ERC20, ERC721 AND ERC1155 tokens.
Furucombo
Furucombo is a tool built for end-users to optimize their DeFi strategy simply by drag and drop UI.
Gnosis Safe
Gnosis Safe is a smart contract-based wallet that enables users to manage their funds and interact with decentralized applications on Ethereum.
Huobi Wallet
Huobi Wallet is a multi-currency wallet featuring cross-chain exchange of mainstream coins, dApps browser, and staking as a service for PoS networks.
imToken
imToken is a digital asset wallet enabling multi-chain asset management, dApp browsing and exchange of value.
Infinito Wallet
Infinito Wallet is a mobile multi-currency wallet with dApps browser for interacting with the DeFi ecosystem.
InstaDApp
InstaDApp is a platform providing users and developers with a single point of integration to access all the DeFi protocols
Ledger
Ledger wallets, designed with the highest security standards
Melon Terminal
Melon Terminal is a user interface that allows interaction with on-chain funds deployed on Melon Protocol.
MetaMask
MetaMask is a browser extension that allows users to run Ethereum dApps and interacting with smart contracts.
Multis
Multis is a multi-signature Ethereum wallet with a user-friendly interface to manage your company’s crypto.
MyCrypto
MyCrypto makes managing your ETH & ERC20 tokens easy. Use MyCrypto to create wallets, buy crypto, manage your assets, and interact with the blockchain.
MyEtherWallet
MyEtherWallet is a free, open-source, client-side interface for generating Ethereum wallets and interacting with dApps.
Portis
The Non-Custodial Blockchain Wallet that Makes Apps Simple for Everyone
Scatter
Scatter is a desktop multi-blockchain wallet with signature, identity and reputation features and dApps browser.
TokenSets
TokenSets is the asset management platform with tokenized trading strategies facilitated by Set Protocol’s smart contract system.
Trust Wallet
Multi cryptocurrency wallet to store your favorite BEP2, ERC20 and ERC721, tokens.
Tangany
Tangany is a custody provider for companies to tokenize assets into digital assets. The service will handle the storage of private keys in the cloud as well as blockchain access via a stable node infrastructure.
Upvest
The securities API for financial institutions
Zapper
Zapper is a system focused on abstracting away the complexities of composing and accessing the most innovative opportunities in open finance.
ZenGo
ZenGo is a bitcoin and cryptocurrency wallet with native UI integrations with DeFi lending protocols and staking providers.
Zerion
Zerion is an interface for blockchain-based protocols in decentralized finance applications.

In this world, typical financial services such as borrowing, lending and trading exist, but they operate on a public network, meaning it’s accessible to anyone with an internet connection. Open-source protocols or modular frameworks...
